tool_description: Creates comprehensive audit logs of all vendor qualification activities, maintaining compliance records and generating audit reports for regulatory review.

registration_id.description: Vendor registration identifier for specific audit trail

start_date.description: Start date for audit trail generation

end_date.description: End date for audit trail generation

activity_types.description: Types of activities to include in audit

user_filter.description: Filter activities by specific user or role

include_system_actions.description: Include automated system actions in audit trail

error_messages: Invalid date range: start_date must be earlier than end_date.
Registration not found: The provided registration_id does not exist.
Date format error: Provide dates in ISO 8601 format.
Audit access denied: Insufficient permissions to generate audit trails.
No activities found: No qualifying activities exist for the specified criteria.
usage: Provide start_date and end_date for audit period. Optionally filter by registration_id, activity_types, or user_filter. The tool generates comprehensive audit logs and compliance reports.

total_activities.description: Total number of activities in audit period

compliance_status.description: Overall compliance status based on audit findings

audit_report_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated audit report
